samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control shows the default rendering of the multiselect component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control shows how to bind with  local data source and how to fetch data from remote data service.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This demo explains the grouping of suggestions based on different categories with individual header and icon support in the Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This demo explains on how to customize the appearance of each item in the pop-up list using template option in Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the filtering functionalities of the Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control.

samples.name: Custom Value
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control demonstrates the addition of a new value that is not present in the predefined list.

samples.name: Chip Customization
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control demonstrates on how to customize the selected chip element when select.

samples.name: CheckBox
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control demonstrates the built-in support to select the multiple values through checkbox.

samples.name: Selection Limit
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control demonstrates to limit the number of items that is selected in a component.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the diacritics filter functionality of the Syncfusion JavaScript multiselect control.
